name: The Ultimatum: Choices
storyline: You and your partner Taylor have signed on to participate in the show, with "Too Hot to Handle" and "Perfect Match" star Chloe Veitch as host. You'll meet other questioning couples, choose someone new to live with in a trial marriage, and then make a life-changing choice: Will you fully commit to your relationship, or pursue love with someone else?
summary: Jump into the whirlwind social experiment of "The Ultimatum" in this narrative dating sim, where you'll create a character and make high-stakes choices to shape your own love story.
